title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 177.16 - Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 177.16 - Facilities

State Regulations

Each course shall be presented in such premises and in such
facilities as shall be necessary to properly present the course. No course
shall be presented in any real estate broker's office or the office of any
association of real estate brokers, except as otherwise may be permitted under
these rules. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
177.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
